Package com.game.Models.brick

Class Brick

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.game.Models.brick.Brick
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CementBrick, ClayBrick, GravityBrick, SlimeBrick, SpeedBrick, SteelBrick
    public abstract class Brick
extends Object
    Class that acts as the super class for all of the brick types. Contains all of the logic of the brick object.

    • Method Detail

      • makeBrickFace

        protected Shape makeBrickFace​(Point pos,
                              Dimension size)
        Method that is creates the shape of the brick.
        Parameters:
        pos - Position of the brick.
        size - Size of the brick.
        Returns:
        Returns the shape of the brick,rectangle.

      • setImpact

        public boolean setImpact​(Point2D point,
                         int dir)
        Setter method to set whether or not the brick has been broken. Is overrided by some of the brick types to get the point of impact on the brick and the part of the ball that impacts with said brick.
        Parameters:
        point - impact of the ball.
        dir - Direction of the impact.
        Returns:
        Returns false if the brick has already been broken, else true.

      • getBrick

        public Shape getBrick()
        Getter method to return the hit box of the brick.
        Returns:
        Returns the shape of the brick, rectangle.

      • getBorderColor

        public Color getBorderColor()
        Getter method that returns the border color of the brick to be drawn.
        Returns:
        Returns the border color of the brick.

      • getInnerColor

        public Color getInnerColor()
        Getter method that returns the inner color of the brick to be drawn.
        Returns:
        Returns the inner color of the brick.

      • findBrickImpact

        public int findBrickImpact​(Ball b,
                           GameFrame owner)
        Method that finds the when the ball has impacted the bricks. It is overrided by some of the brick types.
        Parameters:
        b - Instance of the ball class.
        owner - Instance of the GameFrame.
        Returns:
        The point of impact on the brick.

      • isBroken

        public final boolean isBroken()
        Method that returns a boolean of whether or not the brick has been broken.
        Returns:
        Returns whether the brick has been broken or not.

      • repair

        public void repair()
        Method that repairs the brick.

      • impact

        public void impact()
        Method that is called when the ball imapcts the brick.

      • getBroken

        public boolean getBroken()
        Getter method that return a boolean of whether or not the brick is broken.
        Returns:
        Returns whether or not the brick is broken.
